name: collating
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
collate
formal to bring together different pieces of written information so that the similarities and differences can be seen: to collate data/information
to collect and arrange the sheets of a report, book, etc., in the correct order: The photocopier will collate the documents for you.
